text: Chu Fu Tze, a miracle denier, was dead; his son-in-law saw it. At dawn, the coffin was lifted and suspended in the air, two-fourths of the way from the ground. The godly son-in-law was horrified. "Oh, venerable father-in-law", he pleaded, "do not destroy my faith that miracles are impossible. The coffin then descended slowly, and the son-in-law regained faith. FIN
title: El negador de milagros
author: nan Anónimo
